metadata.description: Blast off for adventure with the world's first/worst Astrochimp, Bops, as he finds himself transported to the distant planet Centroa.  With the aid of his diminutive cohort Max and an outcast Scrounger named Sh'A La, Bops struggles to recover his missing spaceship and return home, even as the agents of the evil Overlord Jardu Krush close in around him. All-ages action-comedy.
metadata.name: Spaced Out
